name: caragensspw
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, cpw(cuni(cdm(c2)))))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cpw(cuni(cdm(c2))), cpw(c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, cpw(cuni(cdm(c2)))))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cpw(cuni(cdm(c2))), cpw(c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, cpw(cuni(cdm(c2)))))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, cdm(c2)))
-| wi(w0, wss(cdm(c2), cpw(cuni(cdm(c2)))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cpw(cuni(cdm(c2))), cpw(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, cdm(c2)))
-| wi(w0, wss(cdm(c2), cpw(cuni(cdm(c2)))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, cdm(c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, come))
-| wi(wcel(c2, come), wss(c0, cdm(c2)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ⊆ dom(c2))
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ OutMeas)
⊣ (c2 ∈ OutMeas → c0 ⊆ dom(c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cpw(cuni(cdm(c2))), cpw(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wss(cdm(c2), cpw(cuni(cdm(c2)))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, come))
-| wi(wcel(c2, come), wss(c0, cdm(c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ⊆ P(c1))
⊣ (w0 → P(⋃ dom(c2))= P(c1))
⊣ (w0 → dom(c2)⊆ P(⋃ dom(c2)))
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ OutMeas)
⊣ (c2 ∈ OutMeas → c0 ⊆ dom(c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c2, come), wss(c0, cdm(c2)))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(ccaragen, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cpw(cuni(cdm(c2))), cpw(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wss(cdm(c2), cpw(cuni(cdm(c2)))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, come))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(ccaragen, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ⊆ P(c1))
⊣ (w0 → P(⋃ dom(c2))= P(c1))
⊣ (w0 → dom(c2)⊆ P(⋃ dom(c2)))
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ OutMeas)
⊣ c0 =(CaraGen ` c2)

body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → dom(c2)⊆ P(⋃ dom(c2)))
⊣ dom(c2)⊆ P(⋃ dom(c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cpw(cuni(cdm(c2))), cpw(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, come))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(ccaragen, c2))
-| wss(cdm(c2), cpw(cuni(cdm(c2))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ⊆ P(c1))
⊣ (w0 → P(⋃ dom(c2))= P(c1))
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ OutMeas)
⊣ c0 =(CaraGen ` c2)
⊣ dom(c2)⊆ P(⋃ dom(c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cpw(cuni(cdm(c2))), cpw(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, come))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(ccaragen, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ⊆ P(c1))
⊣ (w0 → P(⋃ dom(c2))= P(c1))
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ OutMeas)
⊣ c0 =(CaraGen ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, come))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(ccaragen, c2))
-| wceq(cpw(cuni(cdm(c2))), cpw(c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ⊆ P(c1))
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ OutMeas)
⊣ c0 =(CaraGen ` c2)
⊣ P(⋃ dom(c2))= P(c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, come))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(ccaragen, c2))
-| wceq(cpw(c1), cpw(cuni(cdm(c2))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ⊆ P(c1))
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ OutMeas)
⊣ c0 =(CaraGen ` c2)
⊣ P(c1)= P(⋃ dom(c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, come))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(ccaragen, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cuni(cdm(c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ⊆ P(c1))
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ OutMeas)
⊣ c0 =(CaraGen ` c2)
⊣ c1 = ⋃ dom(c2)

comment: The sigma-algebra generated from an outer measure, by the Caratheodory's construction, is a subset of the power set of the base set of the outer measure. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
